title: Kyle and Jackie O stunner by a female listener's shocking sex number
text:
They are known for their outrageous segments on The Kyle and Jackie O Show.

And on Monday, Kyle Sandilands and Jackie 'O' Henderson were left stunned after a female listener revealed she number of people she has slept with.

While playing 'The Numbers Game', the radio hosts invited listeners to call in so they could guess the number of people they've been intimate with.

'She's got a crazy number!' On Monday, Kyle Sandilands (pictured) and Jackie 'O' Henderson were left stunned after a female listener revealed she number of people she has slept with

But 34-year-old single mother Carol completely shocked the KIIS FM duo, who significantly underestimated her number of sexual partners.

'She's got a crazy number I reckon,' Jackie O said, after Carol revealed her current occupation is a stay-at-home mum.

Kyle responded, 'Really?' before guessing a total of 50. Jackie then guessed that Carol has slept with with 41 people.

Radio duo: While playing 'The Numbers Game', the radio hosts invited listeners to call in so they could guess the number of people they've been intimate with. Pictured: Kyle and Jackie

Carol then dropped the bombshell, saying she has actually slept with more than 10,000 people.

'Sorry, what was that?' Kyle asked, before the listener revealed she previously worked as an escort for 14 years.

She explained that after more than a decade of working six-day weeks and sleeping with multiple men per day, her number eventually reached five figures.

'Sorry what was that?' Single mother Carol completely shocked the KIIS FM duo, who significantly underestimated her number of sexual partners

Say what?! Carol revealed she has actually slept with more than 10,000 people. She explained that after 14 years of working six-day weeks as an escort and sleeping with multiple men per day, her number eventually reached five figures

It's not the first time the radio hosts have been left shocked by a caller.

Last month, they received an obscene phone call from a listener during the regular segment, 'What's in Jackie's Mouth?', in which listeners must guess what item Jackie is chewing as she provides suggestive clues.

A man named Daniel called in and seemingly began masturbating, which prompted Jackie to say: 'Oh my God, what are you doing?!'
description: They are known for their outrageous segments on  The Kyle and Jackie O Show.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
